content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

No structures have been created on the map as of the current steps. The entities on the map remain empty, indicating no placement of structures or entities has been successfully executed.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing entities
- Ensure the target position for placing an entity is unoccupied and suitable for the entity type. Multiple attempts to place Wooden Chests and a Stone Furnace failed due to unsuitable positions.

### Errors in movement commands
- When using movement commands, ensure that the indices used are integers. Errors occurred due to incorrect data types being used for movement commands.

### Errors related to obstacles
- Before placing entities, perform a thorough scan to identify obstacles in the intended area. This will help in planning placements and avoiding failed placement attempts due to obstacles.
